metadata.title: CVE-2018-10198 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OTRS 6.0.x before 6.0.7. An attacker who islogged into OTRS as a customer can use the ticket overview screen todisclose internal article information of their customer tickets.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
